text:
New @NFIB data show the urgent need to get more Americans in the workforce. Over half of all small businesses report having openings they are unable to fill. 

We can't solve our supply chain crisis without getting American workers off the sidelines.
https://t.co/EQvQhJi7yw
Today, my staff will host #NE03 Mobile Offices in Harrisburg and Minden. Please stop by if you need assistance with a federal agency or have thoughts to share. https://t.co/JEQQwRzI5k
Last week I visited the family-owned Blue Valley Aquaculture near Sutton. They demonstrate #NE03's strong potential for agricultural diversity. https://t.co/ZGi8yVlGzD
Thanks to the @POETbiofuels Fairmont staff for sharing their thoughts on the importance of #ethanol and year-round E-15 to Nebraskaâ€™s economy & American energy independence! https://t.co/t7s5z0b9dl

While leaving market access off the table & excluding Taiwan from IPEF are missed opportunities, I'm encouraged by the launch of the U.S.-Taiwan Trade Initiative. Deepening ties with democracies in the region is critical to our interests. I'm hopeful these talks lead to results.
